extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • managePhase

        public GamePlay managePhase(GamePlay game_play)
        Description copied from interface: IManageGamePlay
        This method here acts as our Game Manager method. This method decides the entire flow of the game. Updates the phase of the game as per inputs received from GUI and returns a new Game State back to GUI. It executes the action corresponding the given phase, update the state of the game and decides the upcoming phases as per risk rules.
        Specified by:
        managePhase in interface IManageGamePlay
        Parameters:
        game_play - State of Game during any phase
        Returns:
        state of the game updated so far.
        See Also:
        IManageGamePlay.managePhase(GamePlay)

      • setCurrentPlayerAndPhase

        private void setCurrentPlayerAndPhase(GamePlay game_play,
                                      java.lang.String game_phase)
        This method decides the next player and the phase during game-play.
        Parameters:
        game_play - State of the game at point of time holding the entire info about game-play. Like the current phase and player.
        game_phase - Name of the phase which is ending.

      • calculateArmiesReinforce

        public java.util.List<Player> calculateArmiesReinforce(java.util.List<Player> gameplay,
                                                       Map map,
                                                       int current_player)
        Description copied from interface: IManageGamePlay
        This method calculates the number of Armies to be allocated to each player at the start of their Reinforcement Phase, based on Risk Rules . Rule 1 : Number of armies = max(floor(Total captured Territories / 3),3) Rule 2 : Number of extra armies added = continent score if Player has captured the entire continent.
        Specified by:
        calculateArmiesReinforce in interface IManageGamePlay
        Parameters:
        gameplay - Current state of entire Game.
        map - Current map on which game is being played.
        current_player - Current player for which Armies are to be re-calculated.
        Returns:
        State of the game in form of a List of Players.
        See Also:
        IManageGamePlay.calculateArmiesReinforce(java.util.List, com.risk.model.Map, int)

      • prepareTournamentGamePlay

        public Tournament prepareTournamentGamePlay(TournamentChoices tournament_inp)
        Description copied from interface: IManageGamePlay
        This method prepares a GamePlay Object for Tournament Mode. It then initiates the Tournament.
        Specified by:
        prepareTournamentGamePlay in interface IManageGamePlay
        Parameters:
        tournament_inp - Inputs from UI to prepare a tournament.
        Returns:
        Tournament containing the current as well as the set of pending and executed GamePlays.
        See Also:
        IManageGamePlay.prepareTournamentGamePlay(com.risk.model.gui.TournamentChoices)

      • update_tournament_gameplay

        private void update_tournament_gameplay(GamePlay game_play,
                                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> strategies)
        This method creates Computer Players, each with some strategies, for the tournament.
        Parameters:
        game_play - GamePlay being created for the tournament.
        strategies - Input from UI where the user selects Players with some strategy.

      • fetchGamePlay

        public GamePlay fetchGamePlay(java.lang.String file)
        Description copied from interface: IManageGamePlay
        This method reads a selected GamePlay File, parses it and the converts it to a GamePlay Object while loading a GamePlay.

      • fetchGamePlays

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> fetchGamePlays()
        Description copied from interface: IManageGamePlay
        This method retrieves a list of saved GamePlay Files from Resource Folder. User then selects a GamePlay file from the given list.
        Specified by:
        fetchGamePlays in interface IManageGamePlay
        Returns:
        List of existing GamePlay Files from Resource Folder.
        See Also:
        IManageGamePlay.fetchGamePlays()

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        This method here serves for the implementation of Observer Pattern in our Project. It handles multiple phases during game play as per risk rules. As the GUI captures data and events for a particular phase and triggers a state change in GamePlay Object, this class here is being observed by ManageGamePlay as an observer.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
